archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Create repository
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Choose a suitable Repository Name and select Private and press There's no need to select "Include all branches", since ESA has never created new branches. You should however select "Private" and provice access to those who should have access. Once done, you can execute "Create repository" Choose a suitable Repository Name and select Private and press There's no need to select "Include all branches", since ESA has never created new branches. You should however select "Private" and provice access to those who should have access. Once done, you can execute "Create repository"
